name: Supermarket Food Court Fever
description:
Hey Kids! Have you ever been to the supermarket with your mom or Dad? Do you love to do shopping at the grocery store? How about managing a food court in the supermarket & play as a chef & cashier in your very own Supermarket Food Court & learn how to operate the cash register. Supermarket Food Court Fever is an educational time management mania game for young boys & girls. In Supermarket Food Court Fever kids have to handle their customers, take orders - breakfast, lunch, dinner & in rush hour, be a delicious fast food chef, and super star chef of your restaurant empire. The more you play this family fun time management mania game, more money the more yummy ingredients you get to serve your customers.

As the super star master chef in Supermarket Food Court Fever, master will be cooking yummy exotic dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner with lots of ingredients to make customers happy. With proper time management, you can upgrade your cooking machines, buy more fast food restaurants and build your restaurant empire, get more customers, manage more orders, and earn more money! You can open your own restaurant chain where you can serve burgers, pizzas, ice cream & cakes. Have fun managing this awesome Supermarket Food Court, you also need to be cashier of your food court, it starts with a manual machine you have to enter the price of each item and get the total of all. Tap on the customer to receive money. Cash drawer will open and you can put the received money and return the balance amount to the customer. You can upgrade your manual point of sale, with the automated one so you can scan each order you can also accept credit card or through mobile NFC, and enter the total amount, followed by scanning the credit card or mobile!

Features:
* Fast paced Time Management mania Cash Register Simulation
* Serve customers & make them happy to get rewards
* Modern payment methods; Credit Card Machine and NFC Mobile payments
* Unlock Point Of Sale Machine to scan items
* A fun filled time management mania game
* Use Auto Complete Robot to get task done automatically
* Use Cool Candies to increase patience of customers

An experienced Supermarket Food Court managers knows how to operate the cash register and serve the customers in, so they don’t get angry on any kinds of delays.
